org.jvnet.flamingo.common
Class AbstractCommandButton

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              org.jvnet.flamingo.common.RichToolTipManager.JTrackableComponent
                  org.jvnet.flamingo.common.AbstractCommandButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
JCommandButton, JCommandToggleButton
public abstract class AbstractCommandButton
extends RichToolTipManager.JTrackableComponent

Base class for command buttons.

Author:
Kirill Grouchnikov
See Also:
Serialized Form
